me dedenama ekama pawule ayiya saha nangiwima wisheshathwayaki.puththalama nagaraya kendrakara gena pawathi me tharagawaliye pirimi/kantha tharaga mulin nimakala dasa denata me masa 19 da jathika krida tharagawaliya yatathe pawathwena tharaga awidime isawwata wayambaa palatha niyojanaya karamin sahabhagiwimata awasthawa himiwe.tharagawaliye samastha prathipalapirimi tharagaya-1.pi.pi.upul manchanayaka (bingiriya), 2.ee.em.kasun priyankara adhikari ( narammala), 3.ke.ji.es.ke.aberathna (ridigama), 4.ee.em.chinthaka premarathna (ridigama), 5.ke.em.dinusha prabhath kulasuriya (ibbagamuwa)kantha tharagaya-1.pi.pi.awanthi jayarukshika (bingiriya), 2.es.ee.purni sandu nishsanka ( kuliyapitiya), 3.ee.em.dinali lakshika ( narammala), 4.ke.ee.champika sudarshani ( narammala), 5.di.em.dulanji madhushika (nikawaratiya)..

edi sita 2000 wasara dakwa dipashika pamini gamanmaga itha dushkarawuth dakshathawalin piri sarthaka gaman magak wiya.elle tharagawaliyakata tharagakarana lada prathama tharagawaliya wuye 1982 di ragama thewaththa suhada krida samajaya meheyawana lada elle tharaga malawa wana athara ema tharagamalawe sahabhagi wu anekuth kandayam abhibawamin thewana sthanaya laba ganimata hakiwima idiri gaman magata mahath pituwahalak wiya.esema edina sita 1993 wasara wana wita elle tharagayan 279 kata sahabhagi wemin 215 k jayagena athi athara in tharaga 92 kin jayagena aththe ek inimak pamank krida karaminya.tharaga pahak jaya parajayen thorawa nima kara athi dipashika krida samajaya lankawe dakshathama kandayam dekak kisidu lakunak nodi binduwata dawaganna awashthawan dekak satahan kara ganimata tharam dakshatha pennum kara atha.

kuwera, wishwakarma katha walata wada wadiya deyak methana thiyenna puluwan.1) saba lesama ahambau siduwimak2) dupathak wima nisa minisun paminima (sankramanaya) aduwima nisa lokaye wenath pradesha wala sidu wuna amudrawya paribhojanaya wishala wahayen lankawe sidu wune nathi nisa3) dupathak wima nisa rata watema sagarayen paminena sanyoga nisa (sandahan kala sanyoga siyallama pahe soyaganne weralini)4) sanyoga bahula wimata pradhana washayen balapanu aththe indiyanu sagaraye watema athi antharmahadwipika thattu wiya hakiyi.
